message.body: ï¿¼
You sure you want one? Little Josiah Squirts
Oh my gawd!
That is making me wanna puke!
The sad part about digital pics is you dont print as many images. I want to frame this for the house, for when iliana get about 13....
Sweet 16. Show all her boyfriends, especially the questionable ones
ALL of her boyfriends
Uarts is gonna pay my plane ticket.
Holy shiot!
Wtffffffffffffffff
That is amazing!!!
You have so many supporters, thats so awesome
Mom drives me crazy! She went to have her colonoscopy this morning and should be home by now but idk cause HER PHONE IS DISCONNECTED. And her cell goes
straight to vm.....
What the hell. She is like a child.
Or a teenager.
You think that's it, no phone til payday?
Yeah but whens payday? Cause she just got her check
Maybe shes waiting for it to clear
I really hate feeling like this towards her because i know she worked hard when we were younger..... I just wish she would move into a city. Any city.... So much easier to get a job
She worked so hard to get her bachelors and she's just in such a shitty position for having no work history and no knowledge of computers
I'm afraid to send 500 dollars cash for the car! What if she just pays bills?
Maybe that's not a bad thing
I know exactly how you feel.
I hate feeling like, get a job!
She won't pay bills she's not like that she's not to steal your money
I think her reported income on last year's taxes was like $1400 for the entire year I can't help but feel bad for her and at the same time be so upset that she settles for that and is okay with that
And she creates so much unnecessary drama and I don't know if it's intentional or not. It's stress that she doesn't need
Pay you phone bill!
You are 50!
I know I know
She just needs a phone!
Yeah!
Exactly
It's just like grandma she means well but she sick
She needs help with little thing and I need to be more patient with her

She was about to cancel her colonoscopy appointment because she didn't have somebody to take her there and back she needed to get that done. They don't let you drive yourself after that because they sedate you. She called John's mother and asked her for a ride but it was supposed to be snowing up there today and John's mother said if it's snowing she wouldn't be able to take her. This is all on Monday

I reminded her that she has state insurance and the state will provide transportation to any medical appointment that she needs that is covered through insurance. I was giving her instructions on how to do it and she seemed overwhelmed same thing with the car if it seems like too much and confusing she just shuts down
y

But we got it straightened out and the guy picked her up at 6:30 this morning and hopefully dropped her back off at home at two this afternoon before the girls got back from school. So the girls may have been home alone without a phone to call somebody I'm just frustrated

I hate to say this but if it gets to the point where she needs constant help she will be moving where ever I'm living and working. Her life would be so much easier if she would just let me help and I can't help from thousand miles away
Okay sorry that was my rant but I'm so excited for you and your grants!
Ma text me. Everything went good. They are home.
